interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Third Wheel " from Sara Sakakibara
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Inivte over Sara after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

choices.context: These choices will only appear if Sensei chose "Leave the room" during Carry Me Home .
choices.effect: Locked out of Sara content. Event ends early

choices.context: These choices will only appear if Sensei chose "Leave the room" during Carry Me Home .
choices.effect: Sensei will pursue Sara. Event continues

effects: If "Take things further" is chosen +3 Sara Lust
If "Stay friends" is chosen +1 Sara Affection

progression.synopsis: Sensei invites Sara over again, this time without Ami present to supervise them.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.9p2.
